text: Ikorodu is a city and local government area in Lagos State, Nigeria. It is located along the Lagos Lagoon and shares a boundary with Ogun State. ==Etymology== The word Ikorodu was derived from two Yoruba words Oko (English: farm) and Odu (English: a plant that blackens). ==References== Category:Settlements in Lagos State Category:Local Government Areas in Lagos State
title: Ikorodu
